page.title: 08INDUSTRY IN SUTON
page.content: Telephone conversation with Mr Nickalls of Suton and visits to Bloomers and Farmhand. Suton is a small scattered rural community looking to Spooner Row for its school, chapel, social life and recreation. However there are several businesses to do with the agricultural industry, a builders and Bloomers. Bloomers is run from a 150 acre farm which produces grain and sugar beet. The old farm sheds have been converted into a shop and new practical modern buildings used for the corn and machinery. Bloomers is a flower shop and import fresh flowers daily for weddings etc. The more unusual side if the business is hiring out artificial plants, trees and floral arrangements to banks, industry, showhouses and TV and stage productions. The trees come from the Far East, flowers from China.
